Return to Office isn't about culture. It’s about control. Companies are using RTO as a stealth layoff strategy — they know if they make your job miserable enough, you’ll quit on your own. No severance, no unemployment, just a bunch of LinkedIn posts pretending glazed interns and surprise pizza parties are “team building.”

In this video, we dive into the absurd world of modern office culture:
• Tiny mic water cooler interviews
• Intern donut day disasters
• Corporate merch stores selling you your own job pride
• Coffee bars, treadmill metaphors, and people filming themselves not working

If you’ve be
title: RTO Is a SCAM and Here's the Proof!
